about_the_game:
Embark on a strategic journey in Royal Decree! and lead your kingdom through perilous times in this medieval resource management deck-builder. With hundreds of events, cards and decrees, every playthrough is unique. Balance resources, negotiate with powerful factions, enact powerful decrees and shape your people's destiny. Will you rise as a revered ruler, or will chaos reign? The throne awaits your command!




Craft your deck: Customize your deck by exploring the shop or completing special events. Discover hundreds of unique cards to add to your deck. Use a wide range of cards with different abilities and effects to guide your people through unstable times.


Resource Balancing: As the king, you must determine how to distribute resources wisely and understand that the needs of the kingdom come before those of the individual. Managing your resources is critical to keeping the kingdom afloat. You may encounter situations where difficult choices must be made in order to ensure the realm's survival.
Rein in the factions: Make sure the factions are supporting the crown by granting privileges, so that you may demand tribute in your time of need. The more power the factions have, the more helpful they can be. However, make sure to keep them in check or they may turn against you.
Enact decrees: Even the king needs the trust and support of his people to pass decrees. Be careful though, make too many unpopular choices and you might end up having to limit the power of the crown to appease the masses.


Expand your borders: Expand your influence across the map by confronting strong enemies or unforeseen events that threaten the very existence of your kingdom. Plan your next move carefully!



Will you rise to the challenge and guide your kingdom to prosperity, or will your decisions lead to its downfall? The fate of the realm hangs in the balance in Royal Decree!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Build a lasting legacy in Royal Decree! Faced with difficult crises, moral dilemmas and unexpected events, you must skillfully craft your deck, balance the resources, rein in the factions, enact powerful decrees, and make tough decisions to protect your crown and indeed your very head!
